name: Hit the road
description:
Drive until you run out of fuel, or luck.

This game was done for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 12 in a little less than a week.

The theme was: Road Trip

This is one of my first released projects, so please leave any thought, critic or advice about the game in the comments section !

Thanks for playing, and have fun !

- Flinth

Default controls:

  • Keyboard and mouse
    • Click/Left control to Start/Restart the game.
    • WASD/Arrows to move
    • P to pause
    • ESC to quit
  • Controller
    • A to Start/Restart the game
    • Joystick to move
    • Start to Pause
    • Back to quit

Credits:

  • Music: CountryBoy - Bensound
  • SFXs: Freesound.org
  • Player car by graphiczous at Free3D.com
